ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Guild/GM application (Bertoxx)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup, I had the same question.  I mean just a few minutes on the web and you could get the answer to all of them with the exception of maybe a small handful but
ygData.messageBody:
Yup, I had the same question. I mean just a few minutes on the web and you
could get the answer to all of them with the exception of maybe a small
handful but you could find those as well. I filled it out and answered "I
dont know, but I am sure I could find out on the www if I wanted. However I
dont think that's what you want." Or something very close to that. I got
picked but then turned it down because they didn't pick me until a couple
weeks before I went on my 6 month cruise. I'll try again when I get back.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 19, 2001 10:42 PM
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [EverQuest] Guild/GM application (Bertoxx)


Has anyone applied for the guild/gm thing yet?

I'm trying to figure out if they wish for us to search the net for the info
in the questionaire...or do they wish for us to admit we don't know
